Effect.en:
Your other "Senka" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Senka Herald - Zhang Yuan" once per turn.
● At the start of the Damage Step, if your "Senka" monster battles an opponent's face-up monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, that opponent's monster loses 1000 ATK.
● If a card(s) your opponent controls is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.
